attributes.action: Should owner occupier rioters have their assests seized?
attributes.additional_details: There are petitions asking for convicted rioters to forfeit their benefits and be evicted from their homes if in social housing. However, not all rioters and looters are in receipt of benefits; some are employed and live in nice homes that they have bought. In the interest of equality, how about seizing the assets of owner occupiers who are convicted of looting and other crimes connected to the riots ?
